column4: Hi, I have two xscreens running (0 and 1), how can I send the output of one command (e.g. mplayer blabla.mpg) to the other screen( from the terminal)?
nvm, I think blabla --:1 would work
you should use "Display=0.1 mplayer blabla.jpg", that will start mplayer on your other screen
you can also use the -fs switch when starting mplayer to make it fullscreen
